channel.title: ADMIN/MOD....noobs! :)
channel.description:
OK ive read atleast like 20 bulletins...I MADE MY OWN SERVER NOW HOW DO I MAKE MYSELF ADMIN/MOD......................
1. Go into ur source or w/e ur using... 2. Find and open CHARACTER folder.. 3. Find your name 4. once u find it open it.. 5. Find the line that says player Rights its usually like the 9th line 6. it should look like this: character-rights = 0 7. Chane the zero to 3 for owener 2 for admin 1 for mod so if ur owner it should look like this: character-rights = 3 then save but u must be logged outa ur acc in order for this to work and if ur makin someone admin/mod then must be logged out!

item.title: ADMIN/MOD....noobs! :)
item.dc:creator: @jadese jadese
item.description:
@jadese wrote:

Playerrights = 0 normal player
Playerrights = 1 mod
Playerrights = 2 admin
Playerrights = 3 owner
Playerrights = 4 hidden admin

Read full topic

item.title: ADMIN/MOD....noobs! :)
item.dc:creator: @winram101 winram101
item.description:
@winram101 wrote:

OK ive read atleast like 20 bulletins…I MADE MY OWN SERVER NOW HOW DO I MAKE MYSELF ADMIN/MOD…

  1. Go into ur source or w/e ur using…
  2. Find and open CHARACTER folder…
  3. Find your name
  4. once u find it open it…
  5. Find the line that says player Rights its usually like the 9th line
  6. it should look like this: character-rights = 0
  7. Chane the zero to 3 for owener 2 for admin 1 for mod so if ur owner it should look like this: character-rights = 3 then save
    but u must be logged outa ur acc in order for this to work and if ur makin someone admin/mod then must be logged out!

Read full topic
